definition: addicted to/fond of/stem corresponding to -phil or -phile

sentences.english: Lusty bloodthirsty not of light hang out.
sentences.chinese: 妖媚的嗜血不属光明的流浪人。

sentences.english: For cranking up his Damage, the Cloaktrickster also boastsBloodthirsty and Sneak Attack.
sentences.chinese: 为了提升他的伤害，斗蓬盗贼也拥有嗜血及偷袭能力。

sentences.english: Have you gorged yourself at last, in your lust for blood?
sentences.chinese: 你是否终于饱食了你嗜血的欲望？

sentences.english: I wasn't reading the Twilight books or watching True Blood.
sentences.chinese: 我没有读《暮光之城》系列，也没看《嗜血真爱》。

sentences.english: It also has something profound. That is the sanguinary nature of human beings.
sentences.chinese: 里面还有一种刻骨铭心的东西，就是人类的嗜血本性。

sentences.english: Whirlwind has a 10 second cooldown, Bloodthirst has a 6 second cooldown.
sentences.chinese: 旋风斩要10秒才能冷却，嗜血要6秒冷却。

sentences.english: Icy Veins spell haste bonus no longer stacks with Bloodlust.
sentences.chinese: 冰脉的施法加速效果不再和嗜血叠加。

sentences.english: Bloodthirst hits for significantly more than their normal autoattacks.
sentences.chinese: 嗜血攻击比自动攻击牛b的多。

sentences.english: My hammer's a cold piece of blood-lethal steel.
sentences.chinese: 我得锤子是嗜血且致命的钢铁。

sentences.english: Move Leeching Licid onto target creature.
sentences.chinese: 将嗜血立吸怪移至目标生物上。

sentences.english: A crow of bloodthirsty ants is attracted by the carrion.
sentences.chinese: 一群嗜血的蚂蚁被腐肉所吸引。

sentences.english: My haer's a cold piece of blood-lethal steel.
sentences.chinese: 我得锤子是嗜血且致命的钢铁。

sentences.english: Each organization determines the extent of documentation required ad the media to be used.
sentences.chinese: 在分类上把这种细菌只是暂时性地作为类嗜血杆菌。

sentences.english: The incidence of epiglottitis has decreased since the introduction of the HIB (Haemophilus influenzae B) vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 自从引入流感嗜血菌疫苗后，会厌炎发病率明显降低。

sentences.english: All you blood-thirsty bystanders, will you try to find your seats?
sentences.chinese: 你们这些嗜血的旁观者，能不能找好自己的座位？

definition: Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology
